item.description:
Hope to see you there
Not playing in westboro so I thought we might try the mall in Marlboro
If there is anyone who wants to meet before for Appetizer or drink
at Fridays let me know . I can be there around 5:45
Kerry Skinner
Independent Beauty Consultant
Phone: (508) 854-0552
Cell: (508) 868-0806
Email: KerrySkinner@MaryKay.com
WebSite: http://www.MaryKay.co...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet me a half hour before the film Make sure to buy tickets a head of time it was not playing in westboro so I thought we would try marlboro
item.why: we are a really fun group of people

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: The Other Boleyn Girl Friday night
